NK086(lu)002:1: // snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum gyis mtshon pa'i mdo rgyud spyi'i
NK086(lu)002:2: 'chad thabs ud pa la'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
NK086(lu)002:3: bzhugs so // bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK086(lu)002:4: gang gi mkhyen dang brtse ba'i ye shes kyis //
NK086(lu)002:5: shes bya'i chos khams mtha' dag cig char du //
NK086(lu)002:6: mnyams shing ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa ru //
NK086(lu)002:7: kun gzigs khyab bdag bla mas dge legs stsol //
NK086(lu)002:8: rnam dag thub pa'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho la //
NK086(lu)002:9: sbyangs pa'i spyan ras yangs por gyur pa rnams //
NK086(lu)002:10: 'di 'dra'i gtam gyi sbyor bas ci zhig mgu //
NK086(lu)002:11: 'on tang blo gsar 'chad nyan spro ba dag /sbyor ba gtam gyis chos sgo 'byed pa la //
NK086(lu)002:12: thog mar dge ba 'chad bya'i chos ngos bzung //
NK086(lu)002:13: gleng gzhi ston pas ji ltar gsung pa'i tshul //
NK086(lu)002:14: brgyud pa'i babs lugs 'chad pa'i go rim dang //
NK086(lu)002:15: 'chad pa'i slob dpon nyan pa'i slob ma'i tshul //
NK086(lu)002:16: 'chad nyan bgyid pa'i bsam pa kun slong dang //
NK086(lu)002:17: sbyor ba kun spyod dam pa gsum ldan gyis //
NK086(lu)002:18: phan yon dang bcas go rim ji bzhin bshad //
NK086(lu)002:19: de la 'dir snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum lta bus mtshon pa'i chos 'chad pa la zhugs pa'i tshe /
NK086(lu)002:20: 'o nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad
NK086(lu)002:21: kyi don du rnam mkhyen bla na med pa zung
NK086(lu)002:22: 'jug sku bzhi ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid khyab badga
NK086(lu)002:23: rdo rje 'achanga chena po'i go 'aphanga sku tshe 'di
NK086(lu)002:25: de'i ched du zab gsang bla na med pa rdo
NK086(lu)002:26: rje theg pa'i rgyud sde zab mo'i rim pa rnams
NK086(lu)002:27: gsan nas de dag gi brjod bya'i don rnams tshul
NK086(lu)002:28: bzhin thugs nyams su bzhes par bagyi'o snyams pa'i bsam
NK086(lu)002:29: pa byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed pa dang bcas
NK086(lu)002:30: pas chos nyan pa'i kun slong dang kun spyod rnams
NK086(lu)002:31: gsal gdab ste / dran pa nye bar bzhag nas
NK086(lu)002:32: spangs blang ma nor ba'i sgo nas gsan par zhu
NK086(lu)002:33: gsal gdab ste / / 'dir gang zhig gsan par bya ba'i skabs su babs pa'i chos ni /
NK086(lu)002:34: bdag cag gi ston pa mnyam med thub pa'i dbang
NK086(lu)002:35: po kun mkhyen sh+aakya seng ge'i gsung gi gsang ba
NK086(lu)002:36: bsam gyis mi khyab pa las gsang sngags rnying ma'i
NK086(lu)002:37: rgyud 'bum zhes yongs su grags pa snga 'gyur nang
NK086(lu)002:38: rgyud sde gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud sde rnams
NK086(lu)002:40: de la spyir bdag cag gi ston pa gdul bya
NK086(lu)002:41: 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas shing thugs rje chen po
NK086(lu)002:42: dang ldan pa de nyid kyis gdul bya'i sems can
NK086(lu)002:43: rnams kyi khams dang dbang po bsam pa'i bye brag
NK086(lu)002:44: dang mthun pa'i chos kyi sgo dang theg pa'i rnam
NK086(lu)002:45: grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsungs pa de
NK086(lu)002:46: thams cad spangs gnyen gyi sgo nas bzhag na chos
NK086(lu)002:47: kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste
NK086(lu)002:48: / kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud las /
NK086(lu)002:49: nyon mongs 'dod chags 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru //
NK086(lu)002:50: 'dul ba'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs //
NK086(lu)002:51: nyon mongs zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru //
NK086(lu)002:52: mdo sde'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs //
NK086(lu)002:53: nyon mongs gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru //
NK086(lu)002:54: mngon pa'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs //
NK086(lu)002:55: dug gsum cha mnyams 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru //
NK086(lu)002:56: sde snod bzhi pa nyi khri chig stong gsungs //
NK086(lu)002:58: de thams cad rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas lung sde snod gsum dang /
NK086(lu)002:59: brjod bya don gyi sgo nas mngon rtogs bslab pa
NK086(lu)002:60: gsum ste ngo bo lung rtogs gnyis kyi chos su
NK086(lu)002:63: thub pa'i bstan pa rnam gnyis ni //
NK086(lu)002:64: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can //
NK086(lu)002:66: 'o na gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa yang de
NK086(lu)002:67: dag tu 'adu'am zhe na 'du mod kyi 'o na
NK086(lu)002:69: rgya gar gyi slob dpon rnams kyang 'chad lugs mi 'dra bar snang ste /
NK086(lu)002:71: gsang sngags mdo sde'i tshul du bshad kyis nyon //
NK086(lu)002:73: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis ces pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brang na mdo sder 'chad /
NK086(lu)002:74: slob dpon bi ma la sogs kha cig ni /
NK086(lu)002:75: sde snod rin po che gsum las mngon pa ste
NK086(lu)002:76: zhes lta ba dang shes rab gtso bor ston pa'i
NK086(lu)002:78: slob dpon kha cig ni sde snod gsum ga'i man
NK086(lu)002:79: ngag tu gyur pa gang zhig 'bras bu lam du
NK086(lu)002:80: byed cing thabs mkhas kyi khyad par spangs gnyen tha
NK086(lu)002:81: dad du mi blta zhing lam gyi lus mi 'dra
NK086(lu)002:82: bar ston pa'i phyir thun min rig pa 'dzin pa'i
NK086(lu)002:83: sde snod ces sde snod zur pa zhig tu mdzad
NK086(lu)002:84: de sde snod bzhi par bzhag go //
NK086(lu)002:85: de dag gang ltar kyang don gyi ngo bo bslab
NK086(lu)002:86: pa gsum dang byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man
NK086(lu)002:87: ngag tu 'chad dgos pas na lam gyi ngo bo
NK086(lu)002:88: mthun cing thabs kyis khyad par 'phags pa kho na'o
NK086(lu)002:89: // de las skabs 'dir ni rgyu mtshan nyid kyi
NK086(lu)002:90: theg pa las khyad par bzhi'i sgo nas 'phags pa
NK086(lu)002:91: 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa nyid ston pa'i skabs
NK086(lu)002:92: // yin / de la lta spyod gtso bor ston
NK086(lu)002:93: pa'i bye brag gis bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)002:95: bya ba'i rgyud la'ang bya ba'i rgyud dngos dang /
NK086(lu)002:96: de'i cha mthun spyod pa'i rgyud de gnyis yod /
NK086(lu)002:97: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la'ang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud tsam dang /
NK086(lu)002:98: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud gnyis te rgyud sde bzhir dbye ba dang /
NK086(lu)002:99: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud la'ang nang gses thabs kyi rgyud dang /
NK086(lu)002:101: gnyis ka'i rgyud gsum du dbye bas rgyud sde drug tu 'gyur ba yin la /
NK086(lu)002:102: de la kha cig bla med kyi rgyud la thabs
NK086(lu)002:103: shes kyi rgyud gang rung gis khyab pas gnyis med
NK086(lu)002:104: kyi rgyud ces zur du mi bzhed par snang ba
NK086(lu)002:105: ni / don la lam gyi ngo bo thabs shes gnyis las mi 'da' ba bden mod kyang /
NK086(lu)002:106: gdul bya'i khyad par las tshig gis zin tshod dang
NK086(lu)002:107: lam gyi dngos gzhi la thabs shes kyi phyogs re
NK086(lu)002:108: re dang / de dag cha mnyams pa 'am lam
NK086(lu)002:109: de dag las skyes pa'i ye shes gtso bor ston
NK086(lu)002:110: mi ston gyi bye brag mngon sum grub pas rgyud
NK086(lu)002:111: sde drug tu bzhag pa la skyon med do //
NK086(lu)002:112: de ltar rgyud sde bzhi'am drug tu bzhag pa de dag las /
NK086(lu)002:113: da res kyi skabs su babs pa ni gsang chen
NK086(lu)002:114: bla na med pa'i rgyud sde rin po che rnams
NK086(lu)002:116: de la bod 'dir 'gyur snga phyi'i dbang gis bzhag
NK086(lu)002:117: pa'i gsang sngags gsar rnying gnyis su grags pa las
NK086(lu)002:118: / 'dir snga 'gyur rnying ma'i ring lugs ltar na
NK086(lu)002:119: sngags bla med kyi lam thams cad mdo sgyu sems
NK086(lu)002:120: / gsum mam / rgyud lung man ngag gsum du
NK086(lu)002:121: grags pa nang rgyud yo ga sde gsum du yongs
NK086(lu)002:122: su rdzogs par 'du ba yin la /
NK086(lu)002:123: de las gsar rnying thun mong du bzhed pa'i bla
NK086(lu)002:124: med kyi rgyud sde rnams na phal cher ma h+aa
NK086(lu)002:125: yo ga'i phyogs su gtogs pa yin no //
NK086(lu)002:126: snga 'gyur gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyud sde
NK086(lu)002:127: rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa la snga 'gyur rnying
NK086(lu)002:128: ma'i rgyud 'bum zhes yongs su grags pa 'di nyid
NK086(lu)002:129: do // gzhan kha cig phyi nang gi rgyud sde
NK086(lu)002:130: lnga'am drug tu bzhag pa rnams ni rgyud sde'i rim
NK086(lu)002:131: pa'i dbye ba las theg pa'i rim pa min no
NK086(lu)002:132: zhes rtsod pa ni tshig la rtsod pa tsam ste
NK086(lu)002:133: do // / don la ni 'bras bu rdo rje'i
NK086(lu)002:134: theg pa zhes gsang sngags mtha' dag theg pa gcig
NK086(lu)002:135: tu bzhag pa ni gsar rnying thun mong gi rgyud
NK086(lu)002:136: do // / sde rnams dang / rgya bod kyi
NK086(lu)002:137: mkhas pa chen po thams cad la grags shing grub
NK086(lu)002:138: do // / sde rnams dang / pa yin no
NK086(lu)002:139: // de ltar na spyis bye brag la khyab pa
NK086(lu)002:140: ni rigs par smra ba rnams bzhed pas /
NK086(lu)002:141: sngar rgyud rnams spyir theg pa yin pa gang zhig
NK086(lu)002:142: /de la bye brag rgyud sde'i rim pa khas blangs
NK086(lu)002:143: pa'i phyir theg pa'i rim pa shugs kyis grub bo
NK086(lu)002:144: // 'on kyang de la theg pa mchog dman du 'dod pa mi 'thad do zhe na /
NK086(lu)002:145: de ni khyed rang rnams 'dod pa'i rgyud rdo rje gur las kyang /
NK086(lu)002:146: dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud //
NK086(lu)002:147: bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la //
NK086(lu)002:148: dbang po mchog la rnal 'byor rgyud //
NK086(lu)002:149: rnal 'byor bla med de ltag la'o //
NK086(lu)002:150: zhes rgyud sde bzhi po rang rang gi ched du
NK086(lu)002:151: bya ba'i gdul bya dbang po mchog dman gyi rim
NK086(lu)002:152: pa bzhi la dgongs nas gsung bar bshad pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)002:153: rgyud sde gong 'og tu grub phyin theg pas mchog
NK086(lu)002:154: dman du'ang grub pa nyid do //
NK086(lu)002:155: bla med kyi sde tshan nang rgyud sde gsum po'ang
NK086(lu)002:156: rig pa de nyid kyis theg pa'i rim pa yin
NK086(lu)002:157: pa dang / pha rgyud las ma rgyud nyid la
NK086(lu)002:158: zab pa'i khyad par yod pa rgyud nas bshad pa
NK086(lu)002:159: bzhin 'dir don gyi 'od gsal lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK086(lu)002:160: ye shes rdzogs pa chen por nye ba dang /
NK086(lu)002:162: mngon du byed pa'i sgo nas dman mchog gi rim pa'ang grub bo //
NK086(lu)002:163: rgyu mtshan de'i phyir rang rang gi spyod yul du gyur pa'i mdo rgyud nyi tshe zhig las /
NK086(lu)002:164: theg pa rim dgu'i tshig zin dngos su ma byung
NK086(lu)002:165: ba tsam la brten nas nan gyis 'gog pa ni
NK086(lu)002:166: tshig tsam la rtsod pa kho na'o //
NK086(lu)002:167: de ltar theg pa rim pa dgu'i rtse mor gyur
NK086(lu)002:168: pa'i nang rgyud yo ga sde gsum po 'di nyid
NK086(lu)002:169: gang gis gsungs pa'i ston pa ni bskal bzang rnam
NK086(lu)002:170: 'dren bzhi pa sh+aakya seng+ge nyid yin la /
NK086(lu)002:171: de la sku gsum gyi snang tshul mi 'dra ba gsum las gleng gzhi'i rim pa yang gsum ste /
NK086(lu)002:172: 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i bshad rgyud las /
NK086(lu)002:173: gleng gzhi rnam pa gsum yin te //
NK086(lu)002:174: 'og min gnas dang ri rab rtse //
NK086(lu)002:176: byang chub sems dpa'i lha rnams dang //
NK086(lu)002:177: mi rnams kyi ni don du gsung //
NK086(lu)002:178: ston pa yang ni rnam gsum ste //
NK086(lu)002:179: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen dang //
NK086(lu)002:180: longs sku 'khor los sgyur ba dang //
NK086(lu)002:181: sh+aakya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs //
NK086(lu)002:182: dus ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i tshe //
NK086(lu)002:184: zhes gsungs pa dang mthun par sangs rgyas nyid kyi
NK086(lu)002:185: ye shes chen po'i rang snang shin tu rnam par
NK086(lu)002:186: dag pa'i 'oga mina chena po na dbyings ngo bo
NK086(lu)002:187: nyid kyi sku dang ye shes chos kyi sku gnyis
NK086(lu)002:188: dbyer med pa zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid ye
NK086(lu)002:189: shes kyi bye brag tshad med pa dang lhan cig
NK086(lu)002:190: zaba zhi spros dang bral ba'i 'od gsal gyi dgongs
NK086(lu)002:191: pa las mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa ni dapala chos
NK086(lu)002:192: sku'i ston pa kun tu bazanga posa 'khor nyid las
NK086(lu)002:193: mi gzhan pa'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la chos
NK086(lu)002:194: 'od gsal brjod du med pa'i dgongs pa nyid dus
NK086(lu)002:195: gzhi rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dbyings su sgra tshig
NK086(lu)002:196: rang mtshan las 'das pa'i gsung gis snang bar mdzad
NK086(lu)002:198: 'di ni gzhan ngor chos ston pa'i thog mar ston
NK086(lu)002:199: pa rang nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag du
NK086(lu)002:200: ma la snyoms par zhugs so zhes mdo rgyud rnams
NK086(lu)002:201: kyi gleng gzhi'i skabs nas 'byung ba dang mthun pa
NK086(lu)002:202: ste / ston pa'i rnam mkhyen gyis ji ltar thugs
NK086(lu)002:203: su chud pa'i ngos nas bzhag pa gleng gzhi'i dang
NK086(lu)002:204: ste / por grub bo // de nas rnam pa
NK086(lu)002:205: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu dang dmigs
NK086(lu)002:206: pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rkyen las gzugs
NK086(lu)002:207: kyi sku rnam pa thams cad par snang bar mdzad
NK086(lu)002:208: nas chos kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag bskor bar mdzad
NK086(lu)002:209: ste / por grub bo // pa las / thog
NK086(lu)002:210: mar dag pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
NK086(lu)002:211: dpa'i tshogs rnams la stug po'i 'og min dang /
NK086(lu)002:213: ri rab kyi rtse la sogs par ston pa nyid
NK086(lu)002:214: longs spyod rdzogs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po
NK086(lu)002:215: dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam pas rgyu dang
NK086(lu)002:216: 'bras bu'i theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
NK086(lu)002:217: pa rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor lor ston par mdzad
NK086(lu)002:218: pa gleng gzhi gnyis pa dang /
NK086(lu)002:219: de'i bdag po'i rkyen dang gdul bya'i snod dag pa'i
NK086(lu)002:220: dbang las mkha' zla chu mtshor snang ba bzhin stong
NK086(lu)002:221: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams
NK086(lu)002:222: su ston pa thub pa'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom
NK086(lu)002:223: ldan 'das kyi mtshan dang sku'i rnam 'gyur mi 'dra
NK086(lu)002:225: 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang dbang rnon sngags kyi gdul
NK086(lu)002:226: byar gyur pa rnams la dngos dang brgyud pa'i sgo
NK086(lu)002:227: nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi rnam
NK086(lu)002:229: bye brag tu rdo rje'i theg pa nyid yang nas
NK086(lu)002:230: yang du rgya cher bsgrags par mdzad pa ni gleng
NK086(lu)002:231: gzhi gsum pa'o // de ltar gleng gzhi rnam pa
NK086(lu)002:232: gsum gyi sgo nas gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rgyud sde
NK086(lu)002:233: rgya mtsho lta bu de rnams spyir gsang ba'i bdag
NK086(lu)002:234: po lag na rdo rje dang bye brag rang rang
NK086(lu)002:235: gi sdud pa po rnams kyis bsdus te ji ltar
NK086(lu)002:238: rgyal ba sems dpa' rnal 'byor ba //
NK086(lu)002:239: dgongs rig rna bar brgyud pa ste //
NK086(lu)002:240: gang la thug gi bar du'o //
NK086(lu)002:242: rgyal mchog kun tu bzang po'am rdo rje 'chang chen
NK086(lu)002:243: pos rgyal tshabs rigs lnga sogs nyid las mi gzhan
NK086(lu)002:244: pa'i 'khor la dgongs pas brgyud de bshad /
NK086(lu)002:245: rgyal tshabs skyes bu rnams kyi rang rigs kyi sems
NK086(lu)002:246: dpa' sems ma dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs
NK086(lu)002:247: rnams la rig pas brgyud nas bshad /
NK086(lu)002:248: rgyal sras rigs gsum gyi sems dpa' dang khyad par
NK086(lu)002:249: gsang ba'i bdag po sogs kyis rang rang gi gdul
NK086(lu)002:250: bya rnams la rna bar brgyud pa'i tshul gyis bshad
NK086(lu)002:251: / de nas rim par chos rgyal lung bstan rdo rje'am skal ldan rgyal po dzahdang /
NK086(lu)002:252: sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje sogs nas rim
NK086(lu)002:253: par brgyud nas bdag cag gi bla ma dam pa'i
NK086(lu)002:254: bar du smin byed dbang gis lag len ma nyams
NK086(lu)002:255: / bshad brgyud tshig gi phreng ba ma chad /
NK086(lu)002:256: snyan brgyud gdams pa'i chu bo ma nub par byon pa yin no //
NK086(lu)002:257: brgyud pa de lta bu las byung ba'i gdams ngag
NK086(lu)002:258: ji ltar 'chad pa'i go rim yang sngon gyi shing
NK086(lu)002:259: rta chen po dag gi phyag bzhes ltar gdul bya
NK086(lu)002:260: rnams bstan pa la rim gyis gzhug pa'i tshul gyis
NK086(lu)002:261: / thog mar thun mong rgyu 'bras kyi chos kyis
NK086(lu)002:262: blo kha dbye zhing nges 'byung rnam dag gis drangs
NK086(lu)002:264: bslab pa'i gzhi lnga sogs so so thar pa'i khrims kyis rgyud bsdams /
NK086(lu)002:265: de nas tshad med bzhis blo sbyangs te snying rjes drangs pa'i byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed /
NK086(lu)002:266: gzod rgyud sde nas bshad pa ltar gyis dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)002:267: chen por bcug ste smin byed kyi rgyu dbang legs
NK086(lu)002:268: par bskur / de ltar sdom pa gsum la gnas
NK086(lu)002:269: shing rgyud dag pa'i gang zag de la blo nus
NK086(lu)002:270: dang mthun par rgyud kyi bshad pa 'bogs shing sngags
NK086(lu)002:271: lam gyi go ba chags par bya /
NK086(lu)002:272: de nas snyan brgyud gdams ngag gi dmar khrid lag
NK086(lu)002:273: len du thebs par gdams nas nyams len gyi sems
NK086(lu)002:275: de dag gi rgyab rten du rgyud sde so so'i
NK086(lu)002:276: bklag lung phog ste chos gzhug rdzogs par bya ba
NK086(lu)002:277: yin no // skabs 'dir khrid dang lung dang bshad pa gsum gyi khyad par dpyad na /
NK086(lu)002:278: spyir btang tsam na de gsum don gcig dgos te /
NK086(lu)002:279: thub pa'i bstan pa rnam gnyis te //
NK086(lu)002:280: lung dang rtog pa'i bdag nyid can //
NK086(lu)002:281: de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang //
NK086(lu)002:282: sgrub par byed pa kho na yin //
NK086(lu)002:283: ces pa ltar lung gi bstan pa bshad pas 'dzin pa yin pa dang /
NK086(lu)002:284: sngon ston pas kyang bsam gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin
NK086(lu)002:285: bsgom pa'i gdams ngag gsan pa la de dang de'i
NK086(lu)002:286: lung blangs te zhes bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)002:287: sde snod gsum gyi lung phog ces pa dang /
NK086(lu)002:289: kha ton du byed pa dang zhes sogs lung gis kyang bye brag ma phye bar bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)002:290: rig pas kyang lung ni lung nod pa'i don te /
NK086(lu)002:291: rnam par dkrol zhing gsal bar phye nas don khong du chud par byed pa yin la /
NK086(lu)002:292: khrid dang bshad pa yang de yin pas so //
NK086(lu)002:293: 'o na lung tsam gyis kyang don nges par byed nus sam zhe na /
NK086(lu)002:294: de ni ma nges te 'chad pa'i tshul dang dbang
NK086(lu)002:295: po'i bye brag gis bshad khrid kha cig lung byas
NK086(lu)002:296: pa dang 'dra bar don ma nges pa'ang yod /
NK086(lu)002:297: lung kha cig de dag dang mi 'dra bar don
NK086(lu)002:298: spyi nges pa tsam du 'gro ba'ang yod pa yin
NK086(lu)002:299: no // des na bshad pa dang lung gnyis gcig rgyun gcig gis 'dzin par nus sam snyam mo //
NK086(lu)002:300: khrid kyang gzhung lugs chen mo rnams gdams ngag tu
NK086(lu)002:301: shar ba dgos so zhes mkhas pa'i gsung las byung
NK086(lu)002:302: ba ltar na bshad pa dang don gcig tu 'gro
NK086(lu)002:303: mod kyang / sngags la tshogs dang slob ma la
NK086(lu)002:304: bshad pa'i tshul tha dad du yod pas de gnyis
NK086(lu)002:305: la khyad par yod cing gcig gis gcig gi don
NK086(lu)002:306: mi thub pa'i skabs kyang yod srid dam snyam mo
NK086(lu)002:307: mod kyang / // de lta bu'i dbang khrid lung
NK086(lu)002:308: sogs gang yin kyang 'chad pa po rdo rje slob
NK086(lu)002:311: bshes gnyen dul ba zhi ba nyer zhi ba //
NK086(lu)002:312: yon tan lhag par btson bcas lung gis phyug /de nyid rab tu rtogs pa smra mkhas ldan //
NK086(lu)002:313: brtse ba'i bdag nyid skyong la spangs la bsten //
NK086(lu)002:314: ces theg pa chen po sbyir ston pa'i slob dpon dang /
NK086(lu)002:315: bye brag tu sngags kyi slob dpon ni /
NK086(lu)002:317: ston pa mdzod ldan chu bo rdzogs //
NK086(lu)002:318: gnyer ldan rgyud dang las la mkhas //
NK086(lu)002:319: man ngag drod dang brgyad 'chang ba //
NK086(lu)002:320: zhes rang bzhin brgyad ldan tu bshad pa rnams dang ldan pa zhig dgos so //
NK086(lu)002:321: nyan pa po slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyang dad pa
NK086(lu)002:322: brtson 'grus shes rab snying rje sogs gzhung nas bshad
NK086(lu)002:323: pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa gal che /
NK086(lu)002:324: de nas slob mas ji ltar nyan pa'i tshul la
NK086(lu)002:325: thun mong gi kun slong mi dge ba dang 'dres
NK086(lu)002:327: snod kyi skyon gsum dri ma drug bcas spangs shing /
NK086(lu)002:328: 'du shes bzhi dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
NK086(lu)002:329: tshangs pa'i bsam sbyor rnams par dag pa'i ngang nas
NK086(lu)002:330: nyan / thun mong ma yin pa ston 'khor gnas
NK086(lu)002:331: dus rnams la tha mal gyi snang zhen spangs nas
NK086(lu)002:332: phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gsal gdab ste
NK086(lu)002:333: nyan / gsan pa dang / mdor na sbyor ba sems bskyed /
NK086(lu)002:334: dngos gzhi dmigs med rjes la bsngo ba ste dam
NK086(lu)002:335: pa gsum gyis zin pa'i sgo nas 'chad nyan gyi
NK086(lu)002:336: bya ba thams cad thog ma bar dang tha mar
NK086(lu)002:337: dge ba'i tshul gyis mthar phyin par bya'o //
NK086(lu)002:338: de ltar 'chad nyan tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
NK086(lu)002:339: thos pas las ngan gyi sgrib pa mdzad /
NK086(lu)002:340: bsam pas shes rab kyi gter chen rdol /
NK086(lu)002:341: bsgoms pas thar lam gyi btsan sa zin /
NK086(lu)002:342: skye ba kun tu dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang mi 'bral /
NK086(lu)002:343: gnas skabs su yang dkar phyogs kyi lhas bsrung /
NK086(lu)002:344: nad gdon dang bar chad zhi /
NK086(lu)002:346: mthar thug chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang mngon du
NK086(lu)002:347: byas nas chos kyi rnga chen 'jig rten kun tu
NK086(lu)002:350: chos rnga sgrogs pa'i sgra thos sems can yang //
NK086(lu)002:351: ngan song rnam grol nyan rnams smos ci dgos //
NK086(lu)002:352: zhes sogs gsungs pa'i tshul la bsam nas spro dga' mchog tu bskyed de nyan par zhu /
NK086(lu)002:353: zhes sogs mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)002:354: rab dkar lhag bsam gangs kyi ri bo las //
NK086(lu)002:355: babs pa'i legs bshad phan bde'i rlabs phreng can //
NK086(lu)002:356: lhung lhung dpyod ldan rna ba'i dga' ston du //
NK086(lu)002:357: snyan snyan sgrogs 'dis yid dbang sim gyur cig /gang zin tshig 'dis mkhas rnams ci 'gu yang //
NK086(lu)002:358: dam pa'i skyes bu'i thugs kyis bzhed don bzhin //
NK086(lu)002:359: bris pa dam pa'i thugs dgongs yongs rdzogs shing //
NK086(lu)002:360: skye bar chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar shog //
NK086(lu)002:361: ces pa 'di yang sprang btsun pad+ma badz+ra pas smras pa dge'o //
